page.title: 04MACHINERY
page.content: { }The machinery on a North Devon farm would probably include the following: { {TRACTOR, }pulling equipment { {ROLLER,}rolling the ground. {FRONTLOADER,}picking up straw or hay bales. { {BACKLOADER,}shifting rubbish. {HAYTURNER,}turning the hay. {DUNGSPREADER,}spreading dung. {PLOUGH,}digging the ground. {DISC HARROWS,}rolling the corn. {BUCKRAKE,}moving silage. {TRAILER,}moving earth, silage, etc. {MOWER,}for mowing grass for hay or silage. {FORAGE HARVESTER,}for picking up silage. {BALER,}for baling hay. {FERTILISER SPREADER,}for spreading fertiliser.
